channel.title: Can somebody give me a make member command?
channel.description: BAsiclly what title says. I need a command to make playewrs members rather then going into player files and doing it.

item.title: Can somebody give me a make member command?
item.dc:creator: @TeleNubby TeleNubby
item.description:
@TeleNubby wrote:

If you want permanent members or permanent free-to-play for everybody, you can include this in the first packet that is sent to the client:

writeByteA(1); //0 = F2P, 1 = P2P

Should be at the top of intialize().

If you want temporary members/non-members, all you need is a command with:

playerIsMember = 1; //0 = F2P, 1 = P2P

That is, of course, assuming you are using a winterLove-based server. The variable could have also changed from then, too, hopefully to a boolean-type. But that’s a different story.

If you do the 2nd option, you’ll also have to change the value from the first part to writeByteA(playerIsMember); or whatever your variable is.

Read full topic
item.source: Can somebody give me a make member command?

item.title: Can somebody give me a make member command?
item.dc:creator: @Patrickftw Patrickftw
item.description:
@Patrickftw wrote:

Wow…leechers much? First of all, Do a control + f for “makemem” and it will most likely show up.

andrisovas:

How can delete that command on Project Czar ???

also do a control + f for “makemem” and delete the section of it… Maybe if you read what you leeched you MIGHT know…

Read full topic

there is probably an obvious variable in your client class somewhere called members or something similar that you can edit directly in the class, in this case a ‘command’
